src/filetype.c

00001 #include <string.h>
00002 #include "filetype.h"
00003 #include <stdlib.h>
00004 #include <stdio.h>
00005 #include <misc/tokenizer.h>
00006 
00007 
00008 void ftInit()
00009 {
00010         filetypes.categories = 0;
00011 //      int* aTypes = 0;
00012         filetypes.allCats = malloc( 20 * sizeof( char* ) );
00013         filetypes.allTypes = malloc( 50 * sizeof( char* ) );
00014         
00015         memset( filetypes.allCats, 0, 20 * sizeof( char* ) );
00016         memset( filetypes.allTypes, 0, 50 * sizeof( char* ) );
00017 }
00018 
00019 
00020 void ftAdd( char* categorie, char* type )
00021 {
00022         /* search for categorie */
00023         int catExits = -1;
00024         for ( int i = 0; i < filetypes.categories; ++i ) {
00025                 if ( !strcmp( filetypes.allCats[i], categorie ) ) {
00026                         catExits = i;
00027                         i = 1000; /* end for */
00028                 }
00029         }
00030 
00031         if ( catExits == -1 ) {
00032                 catExits = ftAddCategorie( categorie );
00033         }
00034 
00035         /* Type plus one space */
00036         char* buffer = malloc( (strlen( type )+1) * sizeof( char ) );
00037         strcpy( buffer, type );
00038         
00039         memcpy( buffer, type, strlen( type ) + 1 );
00040         buffer[strlen( type )] = ' ';
00041 
00042         /* Get memory to add type to categorie */
00043         int curLen = strlen( filetypes.allTypes[catExits] );
00044         filetypes.allTypes[catExits] = realloc( filetypes.allTypes[catExits], curLen + strlen( type ) + 2 );
00045         memset( filetypes.allTypes[catExits]+curLen, 0, strlen( type ) + 2 );
00046 
00047         /* Copy type into cat. */
00048         memcpy( &filetypes.allTypes[catExits][curLen], buffer, strlen( type ) + 1 );
00049 
00050         free( buffer );
00051 }
00052 
00053 
00054 int ftAddCategorie( char* categorie )
00055 {
00056         filetypes.allCats[filetypes.categories] = malloc( (strlen( categorie )+1) * sizeof( char ) );
00057         strcpy( filetypes.allCats[filetypes.categories], categorie );
00058         filetypes.allTypes[filetypes.categories] = malloc( sizeof( char ) );
00059         filetypes.allTypes[filetypes.categories][0] = 0;
00060 
00061         return filetypes.categories++;
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 const char* ftGetCat( const char* type )
00066 {
00067         for ( int i = 0; i < filetypes.categories; ++i ) {
00068                 struct Tokenizer* tok = tkInit( filetypes.allTypes[i], ' ' );
00069                 char* str = NULL;
00070                 
00071                 while( (str = tkGetNext( tok )) ) {
00072                         if ( !strcmp( str, type ) ) {
00073                                 tkDel( tok );
00074                                 return filetypes.allCats[i];
00075                         }
00076                 }
00077                 
00078                 tkDel( tok );
00079         }
00080         
00081         return 0;
00082 }
